title: Blake and the Maltese Futanari: A Woman Turned Futa Fantasy
description: Blake might be obsessed. She fantasizes all the time about using a tool she wasn't born with. Then a mysterious package arrives, and her dreams come to life in more ways than she could have possibly hoped for.Blake and the Maltese Futanari is a fun fantasy which fulfill's a woman's wish, among other things, and has a surprise menage a trois at the end that will leave you breathless!
author: Beatrice Evenmorne
